nodes.text: The Swoop Droid was a strange droid found by Revan upon escaping the Leviathan, it was found in the Ebon Hawks cockpit with a swoop bike.

During an early development phase, the Swoop Droid was meant to take your character, and your party, to any place of your choice on any of the worlds you had access to. The Swoop Droid was also planned to be able to fetch you and your party from any point, and drive you back to the Ebon Hawk, but then the Swoop Droid got replaced by the Rapid Transit System, which allows you to get back to the Ebon Hawk at any time anyway. It was found with the Galaxy Droid.
